item.title: About
item.description: Office: MF 6.122a P.O. Box 513, 5600 MB Eindhoven, The Netherlands Email: l.allodi at tue.nl PGP fngrprnt: 950E 3DC8 EB66 DFF3 B64D 7848 A0AD 0BB6 5DC4 98F1 Public key here. Curriculum Vitae I DO NOT have a Facebook profile. My LinkedIn page (hardly updated) is this. My Twitter handle is @securescientist. More verbosely I am an Assistant Professor at the Security Group of the Eindhoven University of Technology, in the Netherlands.
